page.title: 15An Arboreal Study.
page.content: Originally most of our block would have been covered with woodland, exclusively of the deciduous variety. Today much of the original afforestation has been cleared so that the land may be used for agricultural purposes.However,the small woodland glades,and the tree lined lanes add a great deal to the character and beauty of the region. We decided to do a count of the different varieties growing within the block,and the number of each type within a specific area i.e Gaer Fawr Woods. On a lovely Summer's evening we visited this excellent wood and using the pathways we counted the number of each type of tree on either side.In this way we gained an idea of the variety,and number of species present in the wood.
